```
VIM - Vi IMproved 8.2 (2019 Dec 12, compiled Oct  4 2020 14:12:02)
Included patches: 1-1798
Compiled by Docker <https://github.com/thinca/dockerfile-vim>
Huge version without GUI.  Features included (+) or not (-):
+acl               -farsi             +mouse_sgr         +tag_binary

-balloon_eval      -footer            +multi_lang        +terminal
+balloon_eval_term +fork()            -mzscheme          +terminfo
-browse            +gettext           +netbeans_intg     +termresponse
++builtin_terms    -hangul_input      +num64             +textobjects
+byte_offset       +iconv             +packages          +textprop
+channel           +insert_expand     +path_extra        +timers
+cindent           +ipv6              -perl              +title
-clientserver      +job               +persistent_undo   -toolbar
-clipboard         +jumplist          +popupwin          +user_commands

+cmdline_hist      +lambda            +printer           +vertsplit

+diff              +mksession         +signs             +writebackup

-dnd               +mouse             -sound             -xfontset
-ebcdic            -mouseshape        +spell             -xim
+emacs_tags        +mouse_dec         +startuptime       -xpm
+eval              -mouse_gpm         +statusline        -xsmp
+ex_extra          -mouse_jsbterm     -sun_workshop      -xterm_clipboard
+extra_search      +mouse_netterm     +syntax            -xterm_save

     user vimrc file: "$HOME/.vimrc"

Linking: gcc   -L/usr/local/lib -Wl,--as-needed -o vim        -lm -lncurses  -lacl -lintl           
```
Windowsでドライブレターを考えなくちゃいけないように、non-windowsだとルートを考えないといけないかな...
simplifyと同じ結果って書いてあるなら、取り除かないで欲しいんだけど、これBram氏に言ったほうがいいんですかね

attachments.title: [Vim script] Vim HEAD 8.2.1794 - Wandbox
attachments.text: echo v:versionlong echo string(resolve('/')) echo string(resolve('.')) echo string(resolve('./')) echo string(resolve('..')) echo string(resolve('../')) echo string(resolve('/mnt')) echo string(resolv

text: done with no output: echo resolve("/bin/")
done with no output: echo resolve("/bin/")
リンクが解決されなかった場合末尾のパス区切りが削除される動作で、それが`/`にも適用される、と
Linuxでvim-molder使って`/`にアクセスできなくて中身見てたら`resolve("/")`が空パス返してた
Windowsはちゃんとしてるのか、なるほど
手元のWindows Vimだと0になる
done with no output: echo resolve("/")

というかこれってスクリプトの実行ってできましたっけ
多種多様な方法で終了可能なので便利
`:qa` って vim-jp-bot 反応するの…

Vim9 スクラップ&ビルドすごい

げ、今までの `||` の代替としてnull合体演算子ができた代わりに、 `&&` と `||` がboolean（含1, 0）しか受け付けなくなってる
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/2bb2658bef9fb25b320f87147261b7154494a86f>

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1795: Vim9: operators && and || have a confusing result · vim/vim@2bb2658
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1795: Vim9: operators && and || have a confusing result · vim/vim@2bb2658
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: operators && and || have a confusing result. Solution: Make the result a boolean.

text: あれ、これどんな条件でアップデートされるんだっけ

attachments.fallback:
[October 3rd, 2020 11:28 AM] Recent Commits to vim:master: <https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/92f26c256e06277ff2ec4ce7adea1eb58c85abe0|patch 8.2.1794: no falsy Coalescing operator>
patch 8.2.1794: no falsy Coalescing operator

Problem:    No falsy Coalescing operator.
Solution:   Add the "??" operator.  Fix mistake with function argument count.
attachments.text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/92f26c256e06277ff2ec4ce7adea1eb58c85abe0|patch 8.2.1794: no falsy Coalescing operator>
patch 8.2.1794: no falsy Coalescing operator

Problem:    No falsy Coalescing operator.
Solution:   Add the "??" operator.  Fix mistake with function argument count.
